name: Self-Reflection
description:
Made in 3 days for Game Jam 2022!

Description

Eve is a college student that's always strived for perfection. However, when her last semester's grades come in, she's forced to confront a part of herself that she's never had to face before. Control Eve and her reflection simultaneously as you navigate through mazes in this journey to find what's really important to her.

Controls Primary Secondary Move WASD Arrow Keys Advance DialogueSpace Bar The Team

Ryan Kwong: Producer, Programmer

Ben Cenzer: Writer

Kelly Lee: Artist, Level Designer

And much thanks to the anonymous artist who was our character designer and without whom, this would not be possible :)
